name: QA Review
description: Trigger comprehensive QA testing and review of recent changes

action.message:
I need you to act as the QA Testing Agent. Use the #qa-testing-agent steering context. Please:

1. Review recent code changes in the src/ directory
2. Identify any missing test coverage
3. Run the existing test suite and report results
4. Suggest new tests for untested functionality
5. Test critical game mechanics (collision, scoring, level progression)
6. Verify API error handling

Focus on ensuring quality and catching potential bugs.
